title: Time Lord - Watch Face
summary: See time in style with rotating dials for each hours, minutes and seconds.
developerAddress:
C-13
Bangur Nagar
Goregaon West
Mumbai
India
description: Time Lord is a watch face for android wear powered smart watches. It shows time using rotating dials. It also displays other useful information like date, day, wear battery etc.There are two included variants, a dark and a light one.This watch face works best with smart watch with a round display like Moto 360, LG G Watch R etc.Please contact us if you find any difficulty/problem or have any suggestion  :).
descriptionHTML:
Time Lord is a watch face for android wear powered smart watches. It shows time using rotating dials. It also displays other useful information like date, day, wear battery etc.
There are two included variants, a dark and a light one.

This watch face works best with smart watch with a round display like Moto 360, LG G Watch R etc.

Please contact us if you find any difficulty/problem or have any suggestion :).
comments: Great watch face! Love it, looks and works great. Thanks for the great work!
Tried everything. I can't find the widget
Unique watch face. Thank you for the free app sale.
Installed it and no icon to open it...scam?
Good design, hard to read Really good idea, but needs option to mirror the discs and rotation for people that want it to go the other way.
recentChanges: Please find time to rate this watch face, if you like it.
